description.value:
A Durable Portable Shelter. Made of AP 15 Rockcrete and comes with radiation scrubbers, acts as cover. Once per Encounter, can make +0 Tech-Use Test to increase AP to 30 for 1d5 Rounds. Can operate for 1d10 months before needing recharging.

Requirements

Starts as metre thick, several metre wide plank, unfolds and builds itself when deployed in ~30 minutes. Can make +0 Tech-Use test to reduce build time by 5 minutes, +5 per DoS.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
